Timezone Handling.content_preview:
All timestamps should use the configured timezone:
- Format: [3:45:30 PM PST] for 12h format
- Format: [15:45:30 PST] for 24h format

Progress Updates.content_preview:
- Update progress every 30 seconds (or as configured)
- Show elapsed time for long-running operations
- Include ETA when possible
